name: Madness at the Thompson's Mansion
description:
Escape Madness is a KTANE-like game where we need the help of our partner with a map to guide us through a mansion with a family story.

2 people are needed to play this game. The first will use the attached manual to be able to tell their partner how to get out of the mansion. 

The second person will play inside the mansion and work as a team to complete the puzzles that are presented.
